CustomField.description: Check this box if you do not want the Company Name field to appear and be required on the Click-to-Schedule page when the External Attendee Create As option is set to "Lead."
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this box if you do not want the Company Name field to appear and be required on the Click-to-Schedule page when the External Attendee Create As option is set to "Lead."
CustomField.label: Hide Lead Company Name
